**Welcome to the Floodlit Couch experience**.

A blend of foot-tappin' rocky pop and electronica. This is a solo creation built within [LogicPro](https://www.apple.com/uk/logic-pro/), that hopes to attract like-minded souls that don't mind using their ears to hear these sounds.
